M

Model - Annotation Type in org.mvp4j.annotation
The scope of this annotation is the view Use this to annotate the input component and bind it to the property name of the model The value seized on the input component value will automatically stored in the value of associated property model Example :
ModelBinding - Interface in org.mvp4j.adapter
This interface is used to retrieve binding informations between the current component and the a model property, and simplify updating model on change event of the component value Use an instance of this interface when writing the ModelComponenet to support a specific component, during implementing an adapter class MVPAdapter to a specific library.
ModelComponent - Class in org.mvp4j.adapter
This class is used to simplify updating model for a given component during implementing an adapter class MVPAdapter to a specific library.
ModelComponent() - Constructor for class org.mvp4j.adapter.ModelComponent
 
MVP - Annotation Type in org.mvp4j.annotation
The scope of this annotation is the view Use this to annotate a class as view and associate two class as presenter and model view Example :
MVPAdapter - Interface in org.mvp4j.adapter
 
MVPBinding - Interface in org.mvp4j.adapter
